title: 36. Q&A Part 2 | Tatcha Skincare, Promoting Yourself, Rosacea Solutions and More
description:
Hi esties and friends - today we are going back to basics and answering your DM questions. We get into our thoughts on Tatcha Skincare, dehydrated skin with acne, how to promote yourself as an esthetician online, and more. Please let us know what other questions you have, our inboxes are always open! As always, we would appreciate a review on iTunes if you feel so inclined. Xoxo, Tess & Lo

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics + Lauren's Blog www.lauren-kruger.com

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa.dermaplus + Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly

Music by LiQwYd

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-treatment-room/support
